trans-unit.source: Used to specify the type of event, and its arguments (if any) to be generated as part of the rendering of text to speech by a custom synthetic speech engine.
trans-unit.target: Usado para especificar o tipo de evento e seus argumentos (se houver) a serem gerados como parte da renderização de texto em fala por um mecanismo de conversão de texto em fala sintética personalizado.

trans-unit.source: A custom speech synthesis engine requests the generation of events under the Speech Platform by providing an appropriate <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> engine site object passed to implementations of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de síntese de fala personalizado solicita a geração de eventos na plataforma de fala, fornecendo um número apropriado <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> de instância para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> membro o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> objeto de site do mecanismo passado para implementações de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de uma implementação de síntese de fala personalizado herdando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e use-o de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias e cria uma nova matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias a serem passados para o `Speak` método em um mecanismo de síntese subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por encontrado valor de enumeração do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instância é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, a implementação

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Converte Americanism para Britishisms no texto a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> fornecidos para o suporte de implementação de interfaces o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> tipo de evento, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instância é usada para criar um evento para a unidade de um medidor de progresso do sintetizador é criado.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de processamento de fala é chamado com a modificação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId" /> indicating the sort of Speech platform event the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object is to handle.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId" /> que indica o tipo de evento de plataforma de fala que o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> deve manipular.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType" /> indicating how the <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> reference of <c>param2</c> is to be interpreted, and, by implication, the use of <c>param1</c>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType" /> que indica como a referência <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> de <c>param2</c> deve ser interpretada e, por implicação, o uso de <c>param1</c>.

trans-unit.source: An integer value to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro a ser passado para a plataforma de fala quando o evento solicitado pela instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> a ser construída for gerado.

trans-unit.source: The exact meaning of this integer is implicitly determined by the value of <c>parameterType</c>.
trans-unit.target: O significado exato desse inteiro é determinado implicitamente pelo valor de <c>parameterType</c>.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> instance referencing an object.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> que referencia um objeto.

trans-unit.source: to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: a ser passado para a plataforma de fala quando o evento solicitado pela instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> a ser construída for gerado.

trans-unit.source: The type which must be referenced is explicitly defined by the value <c>parameterType</c>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo que deve ser referenciado é definido explicitamente pelo valor de <c>parameterType</c>.

trans-unit.source: The value <see langword="System.IntPtr.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see langword="System.IntPtr.Zero" />.

trans-unit.source: Constucts an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Constrói uma <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> apropriada.

trans-unit.source: Permitted values used for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2` and their meaning is dictated by the type of event being requested, as specified by the member of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> used for `eventId`.
trans-unit.target: Permitidos valores usados para `parameterType`, `param1`, e `param2` e seu significado é determinado pelo tipo de evento que está sendo solicitado, conforme especificado pelo membro da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> usado para `eventId`.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on appropriate values for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2`, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações detalhadas sobre os valores apropriados para `parameterType`, `param1`, e `param2`, consulte a documentação para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of the events which can be handled by the Speech platform infrastructure can be obtained through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the synthesizer engine site implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo dos eventos que podem ser tratados pela infraestrutura de plataforma de fala pode ser obtido por meio de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade sobre a implementação do site do mecanismo de sintetizador de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de uma implementação de síntese de fala personalizado herdando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e use-o de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias e cria uma nova matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias a serem passados para o `Speak` método em um mecanismo de síntese subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por encontrado valor de enumeração do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instância é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, a implementação

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Converte Americanism para Britishisms no texto a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> fornecidos para o suporte de implementação de interfaces o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> tipo de evento, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instância é usada para criar um evento para a unidade de um medidor de progresso do sintetizador é criado.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de processamento de fala é chamado com a modificação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> instance is equal to another object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma instância de <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> é igual a outro objeto.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser avaliado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified object is an instance of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> and equal to the current instance of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto especificado é uma instância de <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> e é igual à instância atual de <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> for igual ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> a ser avaliado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> object is equal to the current instance of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> especificado é igual à instância atual de <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="other" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="other" /> for igual ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the Speech platform event which an instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define o evento da plataforma de fala que uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> é usada para solicitar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId" /> as a <see langword="short" />, indicating the event type the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object is to generate.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um membro de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId" /> como um <see langword="short" />, que indica o tipo de evento de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> objeto é gerar.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de uma implementação de síntese de fala personalizado herdando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e use-o de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias e cria uma nova matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias a serem passados para o `Speak` método em um mecanismo de síntese subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por encontrado valor de enumeração do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instância é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, a implementação

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Converte Americanism para Britishisms no texto a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> fornecidos para o suporte de implementação de interfaces o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> tipo de evento, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instância é usada para criar um evento para a unidade de um medidor de progresso do sintetizador é criado.

trans-unit.source: The parameters on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, including <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> are used to log the event generated through the `LogSpeechEvent` method.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros em <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, incluindo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> são usados para registrar o evento gerado por meio de `LogSpeechEvent` método.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de processamento de fala é chamado com a modificação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Provides a hash code for a <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um código hash para um objeto <c>SpeechEventInfo</c>.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to compare to <c>event2</c>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> a ser comparado com <c>event2</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to compare to <c>event1</c>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> a ser comparado com <c>event1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="event1" /> is the same as <paramref name="event2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="event1" /> for o mesmo que <paramref name="event2" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to compare to <c>event2</c>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> a ser comparado com <c>event2</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object to compare to <c>event1</c>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> a ser comparado com <c>event1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de <c>SpeechEventInfo</c> não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="event1" /> is different from <paramref name="event2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="event1" /> for diferente de <paramref name="event2" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the <see langword="integer" /> value (<paramref name="param1" /> in the constructor) to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define o valor de <see langword="integer" /> (<paramref name="param1" /> no construtor) a ser passado para a plataforma de fala para gerar um evento que a instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> atual é usada para solicitar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see langword="integer" /> to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is generated.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see langword="integer" /> a serem passados para a plataforma de fala quando o evento especificado na instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The requirements and meaning of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: Os requisitos e o significado de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> exclusivamente são determinados pelos valores da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> propriedades a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instância.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações detalhadas sobre como usar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A>, consulte a documentação para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de uma implementação de síntese de fala personalizado herdando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e use-o de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias e cria uma nova matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias a serem passados para o `Speak` método em um mecanismo de síntese subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por encontrado valor de enumeração do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instância é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, a implementação

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Converte Americanism para Britishisms no texto a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> fornecidos para o suporte de implementação de interfaces o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> tipo de evento, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instância é usada para criar um evento para a unidade de um medidor de progresso do sintetizador é criado.

trans-unit.source: The parameters on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, including <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A> are used to log the event generated through the `LogSpeechEvent` method.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros em <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, incluindo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param1%2A> são usados para registrar o evento gerado por meio de `LogSpeechEvent` método.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de processamento de fala é chamado com a modificação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> instance (<paramref name="param2" /> in the constructor) referencing the object to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is used to request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define a instância de <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> (<paramref name="param2" /> no construtor) que referencia o objeto a ser passado para a plataforma de fala para gerar um evento que a instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> é usada para solicitar.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> referencing the object to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is generated.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> referência do objeto a ser passado para a plataforma de fala quando o evento especificado na instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: Os requisitos no `System.IntPtr` referência do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> exclusivamente são determinados pelos valores do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> propriedades o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instância.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações detalhadas sobre como usar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, consulte a documentação para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por encontrado valor de enumeração do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instância é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, a implementação

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Converte Americanism para Britishisms no texto a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.

trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros em <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, incluindo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> são usados para registrar o evento gerado por meio de `LogSpeechEvent` método.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de processamento de fala é chamado com a modificação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type of the object pointed to by the <see langword="IntPtr" /> returned by the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2" /> parameter on the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o tipo de dados do objeto apontado pelo <see langword="IntPtr" /> retornado pelo parâmetro <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2" /> no objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="short" /> value corresponding to a member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType" /> enumeration and indicating the data type of the object pointed to by the <see langword="IntPtr" /> returned by the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2" /> parameter and used as the second argument for the constructor of the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="short" /> valor correspondente a um membro do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType" /> que indica o tipo de dados do objeto e enumeração apontada pelo <see langword="IntPtr" /> retornado pelo <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2" /> parâmetro e usado como o segundo argumento para o construtor do atual <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
